casebody.data:
LAMAR ADVERTISING OF PENN, LLC
v.
SOUTHMONT BOROUGH ZONING HEARING BOARD and Borough of Southmont Petition of: Borough of Southmont No. 11 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 19, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
